fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Barricade the Rock Headquarters™️, preventing attacks on Rock members
- Disarm a player during the night

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Barricading gives all Rock members (including yourself) Powerful Defense for the night. You may only do this once.
- Disarming will roleblock the player *if* they attack a Rock member that night. Otherwise, it does jack shit. You may only do this three times.
